location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 42 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports in detail the negotiations between Shaikh Rashed and Reis Bagur Cahn [Ra'is Baqer Khan] concerning the latter's surrender. An additional note on 30 August 1779 reports the surrender of two forts to Shaikh Rashed and another on 1 September states that Sadoo Khan [Sadiq Khan] has taken Abdul Fatee Cahn [Abdol-Fath Khan] prisoner in Schyras [Shiraz].
